thread.title: United American Partners With Randy White
thread.title_full: United American Partners With Randy White - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: United American Partners With Randy White
text:
United American Insurance Company
Randy White becomes spokesperson for Texas-based Insurance Company
MCKINNEY, Texas , Oct. 7 , 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- United American Insurance Company, headquartered in McKinney, TX , announces new relationship with football Hall of Famer, Randy White . White earned the Lombardi Award at the University of Maryland ; was selected as the first round draft pick in 1975 for the Dallas Cowboys; and played in three Super Bowls and six NFC title games. White was also named to All-Pro for nine consecutive years, elected to nine Pro Bowls, and induced into the Pro Football Hall of Fame in 1994.
"We are thrilled to have Randy White as the new spokesperson for United American Insurance Company," says Charles Mankamyer , Senior Vice President. "His impressive resume stands as a great example of the values we exhibit through our independent brokers and the products UA and our New York Company, First United American Life Insurance Company, provides to U.S. consumers."
Randy White will help promote United American's insurance products and the excellent career opportunity the Company makes possible through its independent broker sales force. White will be featured in promotional advertisements to aid in United American's independent broker recruiting goals. Visit www.UnitedAmerican.com to learn more.
COMPANY FACT SHEET
Founded in 1947 Wholly-owned subsidiary of Torchmark Corporation (NYSE: TMK) United American has earned the A+ (Superior) Financial Strength Rating from A.M. Best Company for 35 consecutive years (as of 6/15) PARENT COMPANY FACTS
Torchmark Corporation (NYSE: TMK) Member of the S&P 500 Index Ranked #621 Fortune 1000 company â€“ 2015 Ranked #28 on Dallas Morning News 2015 Top 150 D/FW Companies list Ranked #68 on 2015 Texas 1000 list Torchmark Corporation affiliates include: American Income Life Insurance Company Globe Life And Accident Insurance Company Liberty National Life Insurance Company United American Insurance Company Family Heritage Life Insurance Company Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151007/275081
